name: The Daily Deals Magento Extension
body:
The Daily Deals Magento Extension
=====
in progress, but works!
***

Configuring Daily Deals Extension in the System >> Configuration >> Rudoman >> Daily Deals
![Configuring](http://i44.tinypic.com/6r7uiw.png)

Setting product as daily deal:
![product](http://i39.tinypic.com/2q83cyq.png)

Manage all daily deals:
![manage](http://i43.tinypic.com/30ry7mf.png)

List of all Daily Deals:
![list](http://i39.tinypic.com/29xiupz.png)
